thread.section_title: OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul | oceanebeauty.com
thread.title: MSMN17

author: MSMN17
title: MSMN17
text: I ended up buying quite a bit of different product. Good salesman at DIA...he told me to try for a month and if not satisfied I could get a refund. I bought these 12/5 and called and left a message 12/29 . I never received a call back and was busy so I didn't email until Jan 11th and the return email said it was too late for refund. Obviously I am very dissatisfied. Thank you
